name: layra (liweiphys)
description: [项目级] LAYRA—an enterprise-ready, out-of-the-box solution—unlocks next-generation intelligent systems powered by visual RAG and limitless visual multi-step agent workflow orchestration.。来源: https://github.com/liweiphys/layra

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
LAYRA—an enterprise-ready, out-of-the-box solution—unlocks next-generation intelligent systems powered by visual RAG and limitless visual multi-step agent workflow orchestration.

来源: https://github.com/liweiphys/layra
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 897
